sample_name: # Note the sample_name is conformed to that used in the PACB assemblies at ftp://ftp.sanger.ac.uk/pub/project/pathogens/Plasmodium/falciparum/PF3K/ReferenceGenomes_Version1/GENOMES/
# ILMN sample accessions with > 1 read accession on 01/05/2020: PfIT, PfTG01, PfML01, KH01

# Rationale for choice: PfIT pick one of two MiSeq runs as opposed to HiSeq2500, because less PCR amplification (Thomas Otto personal comm.), and the latter are > 10 GB of reads. Others: pick the read accession with largest file size.
